text: Henry Kwong is a Hong Kong racing driver previously competing in the World Touring Car Championship driver, where he made his debut in 2014. ==Racing career== Kwong began his career in 2012 in the Malaysia Merdeka Endurance Race. In 2014 Kwong made his World Touring Car Championship debut with Campos Racing driving a SEAT León WTCC in the last two rounds of the championship. ==Racing record== ===Complete World Touring Car Championship results=== (key) (Races in bold indicate pole position – 1 point awarded just in first race; races in italics indicate fastest lap – 1 point awarded all races; * signifies that driver led race for at least one lap – 1 point given all races) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:85%" !
